channel.title: (neutral) The Sacrificer
channel.description:
What this class does is it needs to kill 4 bd and it will learn the identities/roles of all the unseen and will need to kill 3 unssen/cult to learn the identities/roles of all the bd
This class is unique
Passive 1: See it through: Your victioms are so badly attacked that only the alch has the knowledge to heal the wounds.
Passive 2: Determined: Immune to occupied/target change
Night Ability 1: Sacrifices: Kill your target player and collect there "knowledge?"
Night ability 2: ToDo
This class is strange cause Bd can use it to learn who all the cult/unseen are but there need to loss some of there members to do so.Same with unseen/cult.
The goal of this class is to just survive but it can become a big target due to its powers

item.title: (neutral) The Sacrificer
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Np, happy to help

Also now I understand better, ty and I like it even more after learning it’s goal

item.title: (neutral) The Sacrificer
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
neutral chaos? There’s nothing in this game called that, are you referring to TOS?

BG? I’m pretty sure there is nothing in the game called that

I like the abilities and the passives but is it unique? What type is it? Also I can’t really understand it’s goal

Read full topic
